user.title: 2N IP Relay Emulator Setup
user.description: Configure the HTTP endpoints that emulate a 2N IP relay. This will create virtual relays accessible via Home Assistant's web server on a dedicated subpath (e.g., http://homeassistant.local:8123/2n-relay).

data_description.subpath: The URL path where endpoints will be available. Only letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores allowed.

error.subpath_in_use: This subpath is already used by another 2N Relay Emulator instance
error.invalid_subpath: Invalid subpath. Use only letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores
